data.event: Around 1781, Jonathan Fitch built a gristmill here, becoming the first pioneer settler.

event.title: was formed from the town of Conklin in 1859

data.event: The Town of Kirkwood was formed from the town of Conklin in 1859.

event.title: 2011, parts of the town were damaged

data.event: In 2006 and 2011, parts of the town were damaged when the Susquehanna River overflowed its banks.
